reviews.review_msg: Tom is one of the best prof's at SFU! He made our modernism class entertaining, interesting, and informative. I've grown a new love for Yeats, Pound, and Eliot. That alot, says enough! Tom ROCKS!
Take his Yeats/Pound/Eliot class -- it'll change your life.

I wasn't interested in this class before I took it but Steve is an awesome prof & is obviously passionate about the subject. Uses various resources (film,art,etc) to add to lectures. Great guy who loves teaching & very helpful to students. I dislike poetry but he made it manageable. Highly recommend.
